intros a' l H1 H2 H3.

exceptions.exn: The reference is_Lub_Rbar_unique was not found in the current environment.

In environment a : nat -> R l : R H : forall n : nat, a n <> 0 H0 : 0 < l H1 : is_lim_seq (fun n : nat => Rabs (a (S n) / a n)) l Unable to unify "?M2366 = ?M2367" with "is_ub_Rbar (CV_disk a) (/ l) /\\ (forall b : Rbar, is_ub_Rbar (CV_disk a) b -> Rbar_le (/ l) b)".

In environment H2 : forall r1 r2 : R, r1 <= r2 -> r2 <= r1 -> r1 = r2 a : nat -> R l : R H : forall n : nat, a n = 0 -> False H0 : 0 < l H1 : is_lim_seq (fun n : nat => Rabs (a (S n) / a n)) l Unable to unify "False" with "is_ub_Rbar (CV_disk a) (/ l)".
Wrong bullet -: Current bullet - is not finished.

In environment H2 : forall r1 r2 : R, r1 <= r2 -> r2 <= r1 -> r1 = r2 a : nat -> R l : R H : forall n : nat, a n = 0 -> False H0 : 0 < l H1 : is_lim_seq (fun n : nat => Rabs (a (S n) / a n)) l r : R H3 : is_ub_Rbar (CV_disk a) r Unable to unify "False" with "/ l <= r".

original: intros a l H1 H2 H3. unfold CV_radius. apply is_Lub_Rbar_unique. intros r H. apply Rle_antisym. - apply H. - apply H.
